Description.Text: The hotel offers excellent spa facilities for relaxation and pampering in house. It is a gem of a hotel for those people seeking a modern atmosphere with more than a touch of grandeur from the past. 0508SR
The hotel enjoys an excellent central location in the heart of the pedestrianised shopping district and just a few minutes walk away from the spa facilities and the casino.

All the rooms are decorated in different styles and their shapes and sizes vary considerably, though on average they are medium sized. The hotel has maintained the traditional ambiance of the hotels history in many of the rooms by fusing antique furniture with modern decor and upholstery. This gives a warm and rich atmosphere to each room. Both the rooms and the bathrooms are in very good condition with modern facilities such as flat screen televisions.
The entrance to the hotel is set back off the road in a small courtyard area. The exterior is painted in yellow and white with many balconied windows.

The main restaurant is very fine and elegant in appearance whilst being light in decor. Local or French cuisine is served here and caters for approximately 65 guests. The hotel also has a second restaurant called Cristal that serves international cuisine and caters for a larger clientele. The decor is Baroque yet modern in style and the lounge and bar area offer a variety of cocktails and wines from the four and half meter high wine chiller. In addition the hotel also offers the Davidoff lounge for smokers to sit and enjoy different varieties of cigars and cognacs in old fashioned comfort.

The lobby is medium in size and the reception is to the right of the entrance. To the left you will find the lobby bar which is bright and modern in design and provides a comfortable seating area to relax and enjoy a drink, coffee and the homemade pastries.
